con:config.con:query: SELECT DISTINCT TOP 100 booking.BVBKID AS bookingId FROM AS400_Mirror.dbo.RZBKVD booking INNER JOIN AS400_Mirror.dbo.RZPITD guestInfo (nolock) ON booking.BVBKID = guestInfo.ABBKID AND guestInfo.ABPSTA = 'AC' LEFT OUTER JOIN AS400_Mirror.dbo.RZINAD a (nolock) ON booking.BVBKID = a.NWIAID LEFT OUTER JOIN AS400_Mirror.dbo.RZGRAD b (nolock) ON booking.BVGAID = b.BDGAID WHERE booking.BVSDDT = 1230723 AND booking.BVSHIP = 'AL'

con:config.con:query: SELECT DISTINCT TOP 100 booking.BVBKID AS bookingId FROM AS400_Mirror.dbo.RZBKVD booking INNER JOIN AS400_Mirror.dbo.RZPITD guestInfo (nolock) ON booking.BVBKID = guestInfo.ABBKID AND guestInfo.ABPSTA = 'AC' LEFT OUTER JOIN AS400_Mirror.dbo.RZINAD a (nolock) ON booking.BVBKID = a.NWIAID LEFT OUTER JOIN AS400_Mirror.dbo.RZGRAD b (nolock) ON booking.BVGAID = b.BDGAID WHERE booking.BVSDDT = 1190512 AND booking.BVSHIP = 'CS' AND booking.BVBKID LIKE '7%'

con:config.con:query: SELECT TOP 100 booking.BVBKID AS bookingId , guestInfo.ABPAID AS passengerId, guestInfo.ABPLNM AS lastName, guestInfo.ABPFNM AS firstName, guestInfo.ABDEMA as emailAddress, booking.BVCBNO AS cabinNumber, booking.BVSHIP AS shipCode, booking.BVSDDT AS sailDate, a.NWBKOF as bookingOffice, COALESCE(a.NWAGST, b.BDBKST) as bookingStatus , COALESCE(a.NWOFDT,booking.BVCRDT) as createDate FROM AS400_Mirror.dbo.RZBKVD booking INNER JOIN AS400_Mirror.dbo.RZPITD guestInfo (nolock) ON booking.BVBKID = guestInfo.ABBKID AND guestInfo.ABPSTA = 'AC' LEFT OUTER JOIN AS400_Mirror.dbo.RZINAD a (nolock) ON booking.BVBKID = a.NWIAID LEFT OUTER JOIN AS400_Mirror.dbo.RZGRAD b (nolock) ON booking.BVGAID = b.BDGAID WHERE --(@In_Passenger_id IS NULL OR guestInfo.ABPAID = @In_Passenger_id) AND booking.BVSDDT = 1190512 AND booking.BVSHIP = 'CS' AND a.NWBKOF != 'MIA' --booking.BVBKID = 70674
